text: Institut Mines-Télécom Business School is a European higher studies establishment. The school is in 3 places. It is in Paris, Évry-Courcouronnes and Évry. It was established in 1979. IMT BS specialises in the fields of economics, social sciences and management. ==References== == Further reading == * IMT BS website Category:Colleges and universities in France Category:Évry-Courcouronnes
title: Telecom Business School
